mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (email, pw, nm, tel, authCd, provider) VALUES (#{email}, #{pw}, #{nm}, #{tel}, #{authCd}, #{provider})
mapper.select: SELECT A.dt, A.memberct, B.rsnm FROM t_matzip_rev A INNER JOIN t_matzip B ON A.iboard = B.iboard WHERE A.iuser = #{iuser}
SELECT B.rsnm FROM t_matzip_fav A INNER JOIN t_matzip B ON A.iboard = B.iboard WHERE A.iuser = #{iuser}
